summary: A lesson in using your gifts told in a manner of JRR Tolkien's classic "The Lord of the Rings."
cast: Phil Vischer|Mike Nawrocki|Lisa Vischer|Joe Spadaford|Tim Hodge|Charlotte Volkman Jackson|Ally Nawrocki|Brian Roberts|Charles R. Vollmer|J. Chris Wall|Andy Youssi|Tom Nabler
title: VeggieTales: Lord of the Beans
